references.paper_title: On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots: Can Language Models Be Too Big?
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of stochastic parrots, a central theme of the current research.

references.paper_title: On the Opportunities and Risks of Foundation Models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the opportunities and risks of large language models, which is relevant to the broader context of the study.
This paper introduces the Abstract Reasoning Corpus (ARC), which inspired the design of the high-level subtasks in the current research.
This paper introduces summative assessment, the principle guiding the design of the research tasks.
This paper introduced the groundbreaking GPT-3 model, a key model used in the study.
